application.name: 模拟群聊
application.ability: 模拟微信群聊，亦可作为广告宣传！
application.description: 模拟微信群聊，亦可作为广告宣传！
application.author: 柒柒源码

manifest.install: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `ims_n1ce_wechat` ( `id` int(10) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `uniacid` int(10) NOT NULL, `title` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `qname` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `aimg` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `atxt` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `bimg` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `p1` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `btxt` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `cimg` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `ctxt` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `p2` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `dimg` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `dtxt` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `p3` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `etxt` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `eimg` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `ftxt` varchar(255) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;
